com.informix.json

Class ClassMapBasedObjectSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informix.json.AbstractObjectSerializer
      • com.informix.json.ClassMapBasedObjectSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectSerializer

    public class ClassMapBasedObjectSerializer
extends AbstractObjectSerializer
    Objects of type ClassMapBasedObjectSerializer are constructed to perform instance specific object to JSON serialization schemes.

    This class is not thread safe

    • Method Detail

      • addObjectSerializer

        public void addObjectSerializer(java.lang.Class<?> c,
                       ObjectSerializer serializer)
        Assign a ObjectSerializer to perform a type specific serialization scheme
        Parameters:
        c - this object's type serves as a key in the serialization map. ClassMapBasedObjectSerializer uses org.bson.util.ClassMap and not only checks if 'c' is a key in the Map, but also walks the up superclass and interface graph of 'c' to find matches. This means that it is only necessary assign ObjectSerializers to base classes. @see org.bson.util.ClassMap
        serializer - performs the serialization mapping specific to the @param key type

      • serialize

        public void serialize(java.lang.Object obj,
             java.lang.StringBuilder buf)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectSerializer
        Serializes obj into buf.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to be serialized
        buf - StringBuilder containing the JSON representation of the object
